  "overview": "The purpose of this measure is to establish an adjudication system and procedures to process fireworks infractions. [CHUNK_1] It also seeks to amend and establish various definitions and penalties for fireworks offenses, including establishing heightened penalties under certain circumstances.   "agency_impact": "This measure would largely address the concerns raised by prosecutors and provide greater clarity and efficiency for law enforcement, prosecutors, and the courts.   "economic_impact": "The provided documents do not specify the expected economic effects of the program. [CHUNK_0] The measure establishes various penalties for fireworks offenses.   "policy_impact": "The purpose of this measure is to establish an adjudication system and procedures to process fireworks infractions. [CHUNK_1] It also amends and establishes various definitions and penalties for fireworks offenses.   "revenue_sources": "Revenue for this measure will be generated from fines and penalties for fireworks offenses.   "six_year_fiscal_implications": "The provided documents do not include a six-year fiscal outlook for this measure. [CHUNK_2] The measure would largely address the concerns raised by prosecutors and provide greater clarity and efficiency for law enforcement, prosecutors, and the courts. [CHUNK_6] It also clarified the definitions of \"aerial device\", \"consumer fireworks\", and \"fireworks\". [CHUNK_7] Furthermore, it clarified the weight thresholds for certain penalties for fireworks offenses. [CHUNK_7] It also restored the authority of law enforcement officers to conduct inspections.   "operating_revenue_impact": "The measure is expected to increase operating revenue through the establishment of various penalties for fireworks offenses. [CHUNK_5] Other violations carry a fine of no less than $500 (HB1483_.HTM.txt) and no more than $5,000 (HB1483_.HTM.txt). [CHUNK_9]",
  "capital_expenditure_impact": "The provided documents do not mention any expected capital expenditures related to this measure.   "fiscal_implications_after_6_years": "The provided documents do not summarize the ongoing fiscal obligations after a six-year period.
